original_title: 大嫌いだった元上司に犯され続け、悔しくもマゾに目覚めてしまった人妻。
overview: Rieko left the company after a love affair with her colleague Yohei. One night, Yohei invites his boss Shimabukuro to his house to hear her work complaints. Shimabukuro was once the boss of Rieko. However, Rieko looks rugged at her reunion after a long absence. That should be it ... Another face of Shimabukuro that Yohei longs for. Rieko was sexually harassed by Shimabukuro while she was on duty.
title: Constantly Ravaged By Former Boss She Hated. Married Woman Regrettably Awakened to Masochism. Tsubaki Kato
